models.name: Light-up Rose with Stem
models.description: Made with clear PLA and green ABS, I modified the base of the flower to fit two 5mm LED bulbs and the base of the stem to fit a slide switch and coin battery holder.
models.description_html: Made with clear PLA and green ABS, I modified the base of the flower to fit two 5mm LED bulbs and the base of the stem to fit a slide switch and coin battery holder.
models.details:
Summary

Made with clear PLA and green ABS, I modified the base of the flower to fit two 5mm LED bulbs and the base of the stem to fit a slide switch and coin battery holder.

data.content: Made with clear PLA and green ABS, I modified the base of the flower to fit two 5mm LED bulbs and the base of the stem to fit a slide switch and coin battery holder.

models.name: NEMA 23 Stepper Motor Cable Tidy
models.description:
I wanted a very compact way to connect a "proper' cable to a stepper motor that had the usual 4 x floppy wires. 
The design is optimised for wire of 8mm cross section, but the slot in the cable outlet is intended to take a cable tie and can grip down to 6mm (or smaller with a modification, or a bit of filing) 
It is intended to attach with epoxy glue. Mainly for compactness, and there should never be any need to remove it. 
There is just enough space in the box area to contain a set of spliced wires + heatshrink. Cut the wires as short as you can to still be able to solder the connections. 

You _will_ need support. Print with the large flat face down.
models.description_html:

The design is optimised for wire of 8mm cross section, but the slot in the cable outlet is intended to take a cable tie and can grip down to 6mm (or smaller with a modification, or a bit of filing)
It is intended to attach with epoxy glue. Mainly for compactness, and there should never be any need to remove it.
There is just enough space in the box area to contain a set of spliced wires + heatshrink. Cut the wires as short as you can to still be able to solder the connections.

You will need support. Print with the large flat face down.

Print Settings

Printer:

CTC DUal

Rafts:

Doesn't Matter

Supports:

Yes

data.content:

The design is optimised for wire of 8mm cross section, but the slot in the cable outlet is intended to take a cable tie and can grip down to 6mm (or smaller with a modification, or a bit of filing) 
It is intended to attach with epoxy glue. Mainly for compactness, and there should never be any need to remove it.

models.name: Shorter cam for 3.47$ 3D scanner
models.description: A shorter cam to activate headphone volume control button. Made to work with volume controls that have a more narrow access to the button.
models.description_html: A shorter cam to activate headphone volume control button. Made to work with volume controls that have a more narrow access to the button.
models.details:
Summary

A shorter cam to activate headphone volume control button. Made to work with volume controls that have a more narrow access to the button.

Print Settings

Printer Brand:

Prusa

Printer:

i3 MK2S

Rafts:

Yes

Supports:

Yes

Resolution:

0.2

Infill:

20%


Notes:

For better clearance, print at 105% or switch to 0.10 - 0.15 resolution. Might require sanding or filing the crankshaft the part connects to.

data.content: A shorter cam to activate headphone volume control button. Made to work with volume controls that have a more narrow access to the button.

data.notes: For better clearance, print at 105% or switch to 0.10 - 0.15 resolution. Might require sanding or filing the crankshaft the part connects to.

models.name: spool holder 16-75mm
models.description:
Customized version of https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:767317

Created with Customizer! https://www.thingiverse.com/apps/customizer/run?thing_id=767317
models.instructions:
Using the following options:

bearing_d = 22
bearing_h = 7
max_d = 75
min_d = 16
cone_h = 30
rod_d = 8.3
$fa = 1
$fs = 1
